New Records: Abdullah Shafique became the first Pakistani batter to score a century on World Cup debut.
Pakistan recorded the highest successful chase in the history of the ICC Cricket World Cup.
Key Match Events: Abdullah Shafique scored 113 runs off 103 balls.
Mohammad Rizwan scored an unbeaten 131 runs off 121 balls despite battling cramps.
Hasan Ali took four wickets, bringing Pakistan back into the game.
Kusal Mendis scored 122 runs off 77 balls for Sri Lanka.
Sadeera Samarawickrama scored 108 runs off 89 balls for Sri Lanka.
